name: Little Lantern
description:
NOTE: There is a known bug in the game where, when you die, the Game Over scene does not show up. If this happens, please press "R" to restart the level at the checkpoint.
====================================
HOW  TO PLAY:

WASD to move

Click and Hold to move Lantern

====================================

Made for the 2022 CPP Halloween Horror Jam

Game made by Sam Macaraniag
